alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Seminole (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 22 at 8:03AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Jackson, Gulf, Bay and Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, western Gadsden and Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida, southeastern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida, central Decatur and Seminole Counties in southwestern Georgia through 845 AM EST/745 AM CST/... At 803 AM EST/703 AM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles northwest of Chattahoochee to 19 miles northeast of Lynn Haven. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Blountstown, Donalsonville, Port St. Joe, Bainbridge, Springfield, Mexico Beach, Hiland Park, Stonemill Creek, Chattahoochee, Greensboro, Tyndall Air Force Base, West Bainbridge, Orange, Parker, Wewahitchka and Sneads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
